channel.title: Vapor Memory on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Vapor Memory on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 13
item.description: This week was the definition of dead. Here is the only thing worth sharing that I saw this week and the corresponding music recommendation. [podcast] Private Suite Podcast : Vapor Memory Interview: This was an incredible find, I didn’t know there was a podcast dedicated to vaporwave until Vapor Memory uploaded this interview on his channel. Being the go-to channel to discover vaporwave on youtube, Vapor Memory is a very well known name in the vaporwave community, a name I would say as well known as some of the older and well established vaporwave artists.
